analysis.key_quote: Removing process protections allows supervisors, political appointees and sub-political appointees to self-define performance without having any personal accountability for their actions, and, it necessarily makes any further adjudication of disagreements impossible.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of existing protections for civil servants and the risks of politicization and lack of accountability that would arise from removing due process protections.
